analysis.description:
Reentrancy in TokenVesting.release (/unique_contracts/0x227756286ae76a42c1335aee60463a7cedeaef74.sol#258-271):
	External calls:

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.revoke (/unique_contracts/0x227756286ae76a42c1335aee60463a7cedeaef74.sol#272-288):
	External calls:
	- balance = token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_contracts/0x227756286ae76a42c1335aee60463a7cedeaef74.sol#279-280)
	- unreleased = releasableAmount() (/unique_contracts/0x227756286ae76a42c1335aee60463a7cedeaef74.sol#280-284)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- revoked (/unique_contracts/0x227756286ae76a42c1335aee60463a7cedeaef74.sol#286)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.initialize (/unique_contracts/0x227756286ae76a42c1335aee60463a7cedeaef74.sol#232-248):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(tokensAvailable() == initialTokens) (/unique_contracts/0x227756286ae76a42c1335aee60463a7cedeaef74.sol#238-239)
	- currentBalance = token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_contracts/0x227756286ae76a42c1335aee60463a7cedeaef74.sol#240-241)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- currentBalance (/unique_contracts/0x227756286ae76a42c1335aee60463a7cedeaef74.sol#240-241)
	- initialized (/unique_contracts/0x227756286ae76a42c1335aee60463a7cedeaef74.sol#243-248)
	- totalBalance (/unique_contracts/0x227756286ae76a42c1335aee60463a7cedeaef74.sol#241-243)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.vestedAmount (/unique_contracts/0x227756286ae76a42c1335aee60463a7cedeaef74.sol#291-297):
	External calls:
	- currentBalance = token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_contracts/0x227756286ae76a42c1335aee60463a7cedeaef74.sol#294)
	State variables written after the call(s):

TokenVesting.vestedAmount (/unique_contracts/0x227756286ae76a42c1335aee60463a7cedeaef74.sol#291-297) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < cliff (/unique_contracts/0x227756286ae76a42c1335aee60463a7cedeaef74.sol)
	- block.timestamp >= start.add(duration) || revoked[token] (/unique_contracts/0x227756286ae76a42c1335aee60463a7cedeaef74.sol)
